front.title: FCAST: Object Delivery for the ALC and NORM Protocols

abstract.t: This document introduces the FCAST reliable object (e.g., file) delivery application. It is designed to operate either on top of the underlying Asynchronous Layer Coding (ALC)/Layered Coding Transport (LCT) or the NACK-Oriented Reliable Multicast (NORM) reliable multicast transport protocols.
